moves.name: Ember
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target burned.

passives.name: Flameproof
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting burned.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 2
passives.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by 2 the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Healing Sun 1
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action while the weather is sunny.
